response.overview: This is a recording made with a single camera plonked up the back at the Everyman theatre in Liverpool towards the end of September in 2019.  The show started off at the Battersea Arts Centre  in January of that year, before i took it to Australia for a bit (i got a special flight case made for the set of drawers, which was exciting, useful and then ultimately a nightmare to dispose of) and then came home and bobbed about the uk a bit. The show was last performed in New York at St Anns Warehouse in December of 2019.
response.title: Daniel Kitson - Keep
